mean_cn: adj. 态度不明朗的，不承担义务的，无明确意义的
mean_en: not telling or showing what you think about something
word_etyma: non不 + commit承担 + t + al形容词后缀 → noncommittal 不表态的
short_phrase: shrug and show his noncommittal attitude
sentence: I was trying to get an answer out of him, but he remained noncommittal.
sentence_trans: 我试图从他口中得到答案，但是他一直持不明朗态度。
